properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel; Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 16 at 2:52AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
Check of surface and buoy observations shows south and southwesterly
winds generally 10 to 15 knots with a few gusts exceeding 20
knots over the Chesapeake Bay, especially at elevated sensors.
This period of enhanced winds is expected to be short-lived as a
warm front lifts northward. Winds are still expected to become
west/northwest and increase sharply with a cold frontal passage
later this morning.

NWSheadline: WINDS APPROACHING SMALL CRAFT THRESHOLDS OVER PORTIONS OF THE BAY
